description: I ghostwrote the first in a series of e-books about career management for veteran career coach Randi Bussin when she was relaunching her website. The e-book was part of a multipronged content development strategy designed to drive inbound traffic to the new site. Another aspect of the strategy was to post shorter "teaser" pieces to social media. I condensed the e-book into a 10-point tipsheet, which was released in two parts on LinkedIn, further leveraging the value of the content. Posts are available here and here.

I wrote several posts for Toursphere's blog, Points of Interest, specifically App Spotlight features and a marketing piece on the benefits of building apps for events. Toursphere provides a wide range of mobile app development services to museums, tourist destinations, parks, hotels, universities, and publishers.

I wrote multiple pieces for EBSCO's Business Book Summaries for Organizations program. This program provides concise yet comprehensive summaries of "the best" business books, including many from Harvard Business Review Press. Books I summarized include: The End of Leadership, Lead Your Boss, Rice Wine with the Minister, The Reality-Based Rules of the Workplace, Worthless, Impossible, Stupid, and The Proactive Leader.

For the site's first incarnation in 2012, I wrote a series of articles about my experience participating in a 200-hour yoga teacher training. ExerciseYourBeauty.com (also known as XYB) was founded by Meg Hughes-Garvey, a fitness enthusiast and exercise physiologist. It was initially a collaborative endeavor with multiple writers promoting the mission statement of helping women rediscover their beauty. It has since become a personal blog showcasing Meg's workouts and information on life science.

Dedication Yoga is a movement to combine writing and yoga, founded by author and yogi Sarah Wolf, who has published both novels and articles, and is also a certified yoga teacher. In 2012, I taught the initial DY classes with Sarah, as well as contributed articles to her blog, including "how to" articles such as "Conquering the Dolphin Vinyasa" and exploratory articles about initial attempts to combine yoga and writing into one experience, such as "Experimenting with DY in Costa Rica."

For the highly profitable Public Safety Group, I wrote customizable Lecture Outlines and adaptable PowerPoint presentations for several chapters of the Instructor's Toolkit for Fire Protection Systems, Second Edition. I was hired for several other similar projects by this group.
My personal blog about yoga, writing, and life!
